âœ  è¯„åˆ†ï¼š{{@@class.score_box@span@text}}
ğŸ•° æœ€æ–°ï¼š{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##æœ€æ–°ï¼š}}

â¤ï¸ æ”¶è—ï¼š{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.3@text}}
ğŸ· ç®€ä»‹ï¼š{{@@class.brief@text##å°è¯´ç®€ä»‹ï¼š}}`;
}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	name=`{{book.name}}`
		author=`{{book.author}}`
		kind=`{{book.kind}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=` 
ğŸ“– ä¹¦åï¼š{{book.name}}
ğŸ‘¤ ä½œè€…ï¼š{{book.author}}
ğŸ· ç®€ä»‹ï¼š{{book.intro}}`;

	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
		name=`{{$.model.title}}`

}

};

JSON.stringify(data);

{{$.model.title}}

`); dataUrl = 'data:text/html;base64,' + b64; java['startBrowser'](dataUrl, title); java['toast']('æ­£åœ¨åŠ è½½è§†é¢‘\nè§†é¢‘åŠ è½½è¾ƒæ…¢ï¼Œè¯·è€å¿ƒç­‰å¾…'); } 'ã€åˆ·æ–°æ­£æ–‡ã€‘æ’­æ”¾\nâœ…ç›´é“¾:\n' + `{{$.model.url}}`; }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) { java.getString('{$.model.url}') }

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
	book.type = 8;
 java.toast('å½“å‰ä¸ºå°è¯´æ¨¡å¼ğŸ§¾'); 
 var data = [];
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /å±•å¼€ç« èŠ‚/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/æ¸¸å®¢/g,'âœ¨').replace(/å¸/g,'ğŸ’°').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /å¸/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
 }else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	book.type = 64;
 java.toast('å½“å‰ä¸ºæ¼«ç”»æ¨¡å¼ğŸ§¾'); 
 var data=[]
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /å±•å¼€ç« èŠ‚/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/æ¸¸å®¢/g,'âœ¨').replace(/å¸/g,'ğŸ’°').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /å¸/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
    book.type = 8;
    java.toast('å½“å‰ä¸ºè§†é¢‘æ¨¡å¼ğŸ§¾');
  var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$.model.id}')+`&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);

 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data
  }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
    book.type = 32;
    java.toast('å½“å‰ä¸ºå¬ä¹¦æ¨¡å¼ğŸ§¾');
    var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/audio/app/audio/chapter?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$..latestReadChapterId}')+`&offset=0&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);
 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data

    
}
 </js>

searchUrl:
<js>
 v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
if (x == 0){
'{{getUrl()}}'+
'api/novel/app/novel/search?category=&excludeTags=&keyword={{key}}&orderType=0&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
}else if (x == 1) {
	'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/comic/app/comic/search?keyword={{key}}&orderType=1&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
	}else if (x == 2 ) {
'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/video/app/video/search?keyword={{key}}&orderType=1&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
		}else if (x == 3 ) {
'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/audio/app/audio/search?category=&keyword={{encodeURIComponent(key)}}&orderType=0&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=42'
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var url = getUrl().replace(/\/$/,'')
//java.log(url)
//å¤„ç†å¼ºåˆ¶ç™»å½•
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//è‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†éªŒè¯
let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("æ»‘åŠ¨éªŒè¯")) {
        let headers = {
             'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl
        };
        try {
            let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("éªŒè¯Cookieï¼š" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("æ£€æµ‹åˆ°éªŒè¯,å°è¯•è‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†â€¦â€¦");
            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('.read-content@html', tx);
        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "è‡ªåŠ¨éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('.read-content@html', src);
    }
    return text;
}

let text = txt(html);

//å¤„ç†é‡æ–°è·å–æ–‡æœ¬æ—¶å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°çš„é”™è¯¯ã€‚
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;
let result;
while (retryCount < maxRetries) {
    if (text != false && text !== "") {
        result = text;
        break;
    } else {
        retryCount++;
        text = txt(html);
        Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(400);
        java.toast(`æœªè·å–åˆ°æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œæ­£åœ¨é‡è¯•...ï¼ˆå½“å‰ç¬¬${retryCount}æ¬¡é‡è¯•ï¼‰`);
    }
}

if (retryCount === maxRetries) {
    result = "é‡è¯•ä¸‰æ¬¡ä»ç„¶æœªè·å–åˆ°æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç»œçŠ¶å†µã€‚"
}
result;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if(String(java.getString('.manga-picture@source@srcset',src)).match(/\/h2\/avif\//)){ //.avifç»“å°¾ result=java.getString('id.pages@tag.a.-2@text') let content = "" let yy = "https://file.acgnngca.com/h2/avif/"+src.match(/(\d+\/\d+\_)/)[1] for(i=0;i<=Number(result);i++){ content+="" } }else if (baseUrl.match(/\/hanime\//)){ //è§†é¢‘ let name= java.getString('h2@text',src) let intro= java.getString('.animation-description@p@text',src) let kond= java.getString('.info@span@text',src) let kind= java.getString('.manga-tags@a@text',src) pi=src.match(/contentUrl\"\:\s\"(.*?)\"\,/) pi = pi?pi[1] : 1; p=String(java.webView(pi,"baseUrl","")).replace(/.*body\>(.*?)\<\/body.*/,'$1') if (book['durChapterIndex'] == chapter['index']) { b64 = java['base64Encode'](`

${name}

${intro}

<js>

	java.getElements('#list@.grid-item')
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/western/)){
	java.getElements('#western_album@li')
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/asmr/)){

	}else if (baseUrl.match(/special/)){

}else{

}
</js>
